mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, NT_NO, NT_TITLE, NT_CONTENT, NT_DATE FROM (SELECT NT_NO, NT_TITLE, NT_CONTENT, NT_DATE FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NT_NO DESC)) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startList} AND #{lastList}
SELECT NT_NO, NT_TITLE, NT_CONTENT FROM NOTICE WHERE NT_NO = #{nt_no} ORDER BY NT_NO
SELECT NT_NO, NT_TITLE, NT_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE ${search_op} LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' ORDER BY NT_NO DESC
SELECT NT_NO, NT_TITLE, NT_CONTENT FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NT_NO
